title: Alf R. Becker's 187th Alphabet - Moderne Caps
content:
From Sign of the Times, this is Alf Beckers Moderne Caps, with lower case and numbers by Mike Adkins. Originally, it was designed around the idea of these caps as initials to a script lower case.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416120535im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontryarb187_500_4419.jpg)

attached is a larger version of this graphic...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416120535/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
